mapper.insert: insert into student(student_name, student_password, student_gender, student_birthday, student_phonenum, student_email, student_address) values (#{studentName}, #{studentPassword}, #{studentGender}, #{studentBirthday}, #{studentPhonenum}, #{studentEmail}, #{studentAddress});
mapper.update: update student set student_name=#{studentName}, student_password = #{studentPassword}, student_gender = #{studentGender}, student_birthday=#{studentBirthday}, student_phonenum=#{studentPhonenum}, student_email=#{studentEmail}, student_address=#{studentAddress} where student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT student_id, SUM(CASE WHEN course_att_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) AND CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) thirdWeek, SUM(CASE WHEN course_att_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 WEEK) AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) secondWeek, SUM(CASE WHEN course_att_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 WEEK) AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 WEEK) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) firstWeek FROM course_attendance WHERE student_id = #{studentId} GROUP BY student_id
